Text:
Hey there Mr... I haven't been able to login into TPB for over a month but have still appreciated all your efforts.

As Always big thx to you amigo.
If ever in the North East US let me know, 1st 5 are on me!  :)

hey :) good to see you managed to get logged back in here.

if you ever get stuck again my shares are always at 1337x.org just type asbo in the search box and you`ll find me.

keep those drinks on ice for me ;)
I guess most of us would pay you something for you excellent work.

i`ve never believed anyone should profit from piracy but i do believe we should all have so much good music we struggle with places where to store it.

it`s cool when people say thanks ;)

Same here... warez, music , whatever it is should not be used to make money.

If you like the trx and are going to gig with them, go buy em and support the artists....Always!
